FAQ¶

Contacts¶

If you have any question about using BRIE, you are welcome to discuss with the developer. Email: Yuanhua Huang <Y.Huang@ed.ac.uk>

Alternatively, you could discuss at the Google group. The developer(s) will try to reply as soon as possible. https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/brie-rna

Report bugs¶

If you find any error or suspicious bug, I will appreciate your report. Please write them in the github issues: https://github.com/huangyh09/brie/issues
